description:
Alpine binding performance on the downhill AND pin compatibility on the climb? The Shift is a new breed of binding that does everything right: pins for the climb, step-in bindings for the ride down. At 1.7.5kg/pair, the S/Lab Shift MNC Bindings could be your one-binding quiver. Pair them with your favorite pair of boots and ski with confidence.

  • Carbon-infused PA is used to create a light and strong binding
  • 47mm of elastic travel prevents pre-release and matches Salomon's flagship STH2 binding
  • Sliding toe pedal allows for compatibility with all norm boots on the market
  • An anti-friction plate ensures reliable release, regardless of your boot type
  • Toe-piece uses pins for touring, and traditional step-in toe for skiing
  • Going from tour to ski is as easy as stepping in a downhill binding
  • Heel uses the same step-down system that is found on most downhill bindings
  • Easy-to-manipulate heel riser allows you to switch from 2° to 10° of rise
  • DIN settings of 4 to 10 offer a range wide enough for most aggressive skiers
  • Certified for downhill and alpine touring boots
name: Salomon S/Lab Shift MNC 10 Bindings with Brakes
